text: He muminagana! Tomara nijedera chara an'ya ka'uke antaranga bandhurupe grahana karo na [1]. Tara tomadera anista karate truti karabe na; ya tomaderake bipanna kare ta-i tara kamana kare. Tadera mukhe bidbesa prakasa paya ebam tadera hrdaya ya gopana rakhe ta aro gurutara [2]. Tomadera jan'ya ayatasamuha bisadabhabe bibrta karechi, yadi tomara anudhabana kara
